title: Bradley Beal 'can't take it anymore!' - Stephen A. wants the Clippers to trade with the Wizards
author: NBA on ESPN
description:
Max Kellerman choose the Milwaukee Bucks as the top destination for Washington Wizards star Bradley Beal, while Stephen A. Smith makes a case for the LA Clippers.
#FirstTake #NBA
